description: Greece is struggling to find shelter for thousands of migrants left homeless after a fire at a camp.
title: Moria migrants: Greece calls for European action after fire at camp
title_page: Moria migrants: Greece calls for European action after fire at camp - BBC News
maintext: "Germany and France will participate in this. I hope several other [EU] member states will do so too," she said. "Migration is not just the problem of the countries where people arrive. Neither is it just Germany's problem. It must become more of a European responsibility."
